legal_basis: RAD must conduct an independent assessment of evidence
decision_reasoning: failure to properly assess the NDP despite recognizing some country conditions
evidence_assessment: refusal to consider the totality of evidence
conclusion_outcome: application for judicial review was allowed
result_of_case: case remanded to RAD for reassessment with consideration of all evidence, including NDP
refugee_status: applicants claimed refugee status based on gender and clan membership
